Entries.default: A sphere floats before you, bobbing under the force of its own magical power.

Its ruby surface is as sleek and smooth as glass, lit from within with a powerful arcane aura.

You can feel that energy press against its confines. Shattering the orb would free it - though what effect that might have, you are not certain.

You strike the glass. Cracks appear in the surface, spreading with a discordant crackle. 

All at once the orb shatters, and the energy it held bursts outward in a radiant flare of light.
The orb pulses with a dimming light, its power waning.
"Touch that, aimoro, and I will split your head like a rotten gourd."
Entries.female: "Touch that, aimora, and I will split your head like a rotten gourd."
